message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product. I'm asking for $11,500 for it.  It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll find it worth the investment.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a reasonable offer, but I don't want to go over my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer, but unfortunately, I can't go that low. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This price reflects the product's value and gives you a great deal. Let's see if we can make this work.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $10,000. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
